content: together and close the toe weave in ends soak and block if desired congratulations you re done now you re ready to go ahead with sock two 5 © the kitchen sink shop abbreviations k knit p purl n - needle yo yarnover ssk slip 1 stitch knit wise onto right needle slip another stitch knit wise onto right needle then knit the two stitches together k2tog knit 2 stitches together as one stitch psso pass slipped stitch over s1 - slip one stitch knit wise with yarn held in back rs right side of work ws wrong side of work notes this pattern is written with a traditional heel flap and gusset but you can substitute any heel flap you like questions email me at thekitchensinkshop@gmail com i d love to see your wish you were here socks tag me @thekitchensinkshop #wishyouwereheresocks 6 © the kitchen sink shop
